title: Textile, 1800–25
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: printed without dye \by heated roller on velvet (Baste fiber plain weave with wool supplementary warp).
description: Flower shapes in relief against a pressed background. The illusion of two colors is given because part of the pile has been flattened. In strong yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1800–25.
1800–25. Medium: wool
Technique: printed without dye \by heated roller on velvet (Baste fiber plain weave with wool supplementary warp).. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-284.
